ComicInfo.Summary:
Allen Keeg has learned first-hand just how far women will go to be with him and lengths they will go to make him their own
Finally driven to a point of no return Allen begins to search for the gypsy witch who cursed him in an attempt to remove his power before it's too late.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 16:47:28. [CVDB347459]
